Turn Tap On.5750: Turn the tap on using the tap faucet

Turn Tap Off.88149: Close the running tap using the taps faucet

Move Faucet.80681: Push the faucet to the right side of the sink.
Move Faucet.4453: Move the faucet to the left.

Put Lid On Container.52376: Remove the bowl from the dish rack, then put the blue lid on the bowl

Put Lid On Container.64929: Put the blue lid on the lunch box and then lift the lunch box and put it on the cupboard
Put Lid On Container.9688: Put the blue lid on the lunchbox and then put the lunchbox in the drying rack

Place Item in Dish Rack.84609: Place the silver cup on the dishrack.
Place Item in Dish Rack.2251: Put the silver cup on the dishrack
Place Item in Dish Rack.94938: Put the container on the drying rack
Place Item in Dish Rack.92896: Put the transparent lunch box upside down on the dish rack
Place Item in Dish Rack.33548: Put the bowl on the edge of the dish rack

Place Item Under Faucet.88577: Hang the gloves under the tap
Place Item Under Faucet.44562: Put the silver cup under the running faucet then place it on the counter
Place Item Under Faucet.86165: Place the silver spoon under the running faucet then put it back on the right side of the counter.
Place Item Under Faucet.82225: Put the silver spoon under the running faucet then place it back on the counter.

Move Sponge.76930: Pick up a green sponge on the left of the tap and put it in the sponge holder on the left side of the sink
Move Sponge.18805: Pick up the dirty sponge on the top left side of the sink and then put it in the rack on the left side of the sink
Move Sponge.27593: Move the faucet to the left, remove the sponge in the sink on the left side and put it on the top left of the sink
Move Sponge.23499: Remove the sponge from the case inside the sink on the left and put it on the top left side of the sink

Pour Contents into Sink.87410: Pour the water out of the silver cup into the sink

Put Item in Silver Cup.26437: Put the bottle with the blue liquid in the silver cup, then put the silver cup on the rack

Put Item in Lunchbox.55025: Pick up the green measuring spoon and put it in the clear lunch box, pick up the silver spoon and put it in the clear lunch box, pick up the clear lunch box and put it in the sink
